-e ---

# adamin

central word to understand Sumerian

𒀀𒁕 a-da "fight?" ⇔ 𓂝 𓎛 𓄿 / 𓇋 𓎛 𓄿 𓂡
𒀀𒁕𒌋𒌋 a-da-min3 #teşētu 2 "contest" !
𒀀𒁕𒈫 a-da-min "dispute, debate" !
𒀀𒁕𒈫 adamin 𒂜 𒈓 𒈘 𒄒 𒉫 𒂛 adaminx; adamin; adamin2 ; adamin3 ; adamin4 ; adamin5 ; adaminx
𒀀𒁕𒈫 a-da-{di/two/beide} "dispute, debate" 𓃀𓃀

𒈓 adamin 𒈘 ⇔ admin “ man ” 𒇽 ⇔ Adam

ADAMIN 𒈓 Adamen = Leute² 𒇽𒇽 admin@Hindu “man” آدَم ʾādam, “Adam”
ADAMIN2 𒈘 Adamen = Leute² admin@Hindu) !! ⇔ min=2

𒂜 adamin ⇔ ante 𒂗x𒂗
𒂜 adamin ⇔ 𒂗𒍪 = Moon

𒀀𒁕𒌋𒌋𒄩 a-da-min3 ku6 "a fish"
